name: Duskwilt
description: The Duskwilt is a small plant creature adept at manipulating light and inflicting necrotic damage with swift movements.
memorable: Its ability to absorb light and create darkness provides strategic advantages in combat.
goals: To manipulate the battlefield by absorbing light and poisoning foes.
relations: Other fungi communicate with it via telepathy.
environment: Often found in dark, shaded areas with rich plant life.
strengths: High Dexterity provides exceptional agility and evasion in combat.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage, which can significantly harm it.
attacks: Slam delivers bludgeoning and necrotic damage; Nether Bolt strikes at range with necrotic energy.
most_powerful_ability: Light Absorption creates strategic advantages by reducing visibility in its vicinity.
senses: Has darkvision up to 120 feet, making it effective in low-light situations.
skills: Possesses notable perception skills with a +1 bonus.
additional_information: Resistant to necrotic and poison damage.
Can heal Undead nearby with temporary hit points.
Utilizes multiattack capabilities for versatile combat.
test_queries: small dark plant that absorbs light
plant creature capable of necrotic damage
